definition: beyond the topmost clouds (idiom)/unimaginably far away
nine/9
firmament/heaven
cloud/CL:朵[duo3]
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
outside/in addition/foreign/external

sentences.english: She is a casual woman who often throws sorrows far away.
sentences.chinese: 她是個大大咧咧的女人，總是把憂愁拋至九霄雲外。

sentences.english: Will let like in making the new future, all will throw outside sadly beyond the highest heavens.
sentences.chinese: 讓愛就在打造新的未來，一切憂傷拋九霄雲外。

sentences.english: The old man thought that too many people now let good manners go by the board.
sentences.chinese: 這位老人認爲，現在人把好的舉止拋到九霄雲外去了。

sentences.english: Point is, I should be walking on clouds.
sentences.chinese: 重點是，我本應樂到九霄雲外。

sentences.english: History was thrown out and dignity and worth went with it.
sentences.chinese: 歷史被拋到了九霄雲外，尊嚴和價值也隨之而去。

sentences.english: She 's a careless woman, always tends to throw worries far far away.
sentences.chinese: 她是個大大咧咧的女人，總是把憂愁拋至九霄雲外。

sentences.english: Worldly all complicated, was cast to be flung to the four winds.
sentences.chinese: 塵世間的一切繁雜，都被拋到了九霄雲外。

sentences.english: What's certain is that 2007 seems far away.
sentences.chinese: 唯一可以確定的是，2007年似乎已在九霄雲外。

definition: to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
mushroom cloud
to send (sb) away/to change the subject/to open (an umbrella etc)
to whisper to one another's ear
to walk right into the trap
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
altar lamp burning day and night
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
to miss/to long for
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
overbearing/arrogant bully
